alert.note: Alert for Goliad (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Aransas, southeastern Goliad and northwestern Refugio Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Quintana, or 9 miles northeast of Refugio, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quintana. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 658 and 666. US Highway 77 between mile markers 604 and 620. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
